trans-unit.source: Represents the requested (issued) security token.
The token is usually opaque to the token requestor.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestedSecurityToken"></xref> class using the issued token.
This constructor is usually used by the token issuer.
The following table shows the properties of the new instance.

|Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestedSecurityToken.SecurityToken%2A>|The value of the `token` parameter.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestedSecurityToken.SecurityTokenXml%2A>|`null`.|
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the requested security token.
token is .
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestedSecurityToken"></xref> class using the token XML.
This constructor is usually used by the receiver.
The following table shows the properties of the new instance.

|Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestedSecurityToken.SecurityToken%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestedSecurityToken.SecurityTokenXml%2A>|The value of the `tokenAsXml` parameter.|
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that contains the XML representation of the requested security token.
tokenAsXml is .
Gets the issued security token when the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestedSecurityToken"></xref> instance was created using the token itself.

Gets the issued security token when the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestedSecurityToken> object was created by using the token itself (represented by a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken> object).
The value of the property is `null` if the instance was created using the token XML.
In this case the token XML can be accessed from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestedSecurityToken.SecurityTokenXml%2A> property.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> that represents the issued security token.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestedSecurityToken"></xref> instance was created using the token XML.
Gets the XML representation of the issued security token when the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestedSecurityToken"></xref> instance was created using the token XML.
Gets the issued security token when the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestedSecurityToken> token XML.
The value of the property is `null` if the instance was created using the token itself (represented by a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken> object).
In this case the token can be accessed from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestedSecurityToken.SecurityToken%2A> property.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that contains the XML representation of the security token.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestedSecurityToken"></xref> instance was created using a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken"></xref> object.
